meta_description: Ensuring that learning, inspiration and creative expression in the arts flourish throughout Arkansas, for people of all ages and backgrounds.
hours_text:
* [InsideWhat's Happening At TheMuseum](https://arkarts.com/museum "Museum")
    * [Exhibitions ](https://arkarts.com/exhibitions)
      * [Current Exhibitions](https://arkarts.com)

        * [48th Collectors Show and Sale](https://arkarts.com/css48)
